name: Trixgen
description:
I like randomly generated experiments. And I like platformers.
So I made a randomly generated platformer.

There is no end, no goal, no objective.

Just you in a network of infinite worlds.

You can run, jump, walljump, duck, double-jump, and run up walls to change your gravity direction.

The main reason why I'm upload this, is because I am proud of the background generation. Sometimes there are beautiful clouds and/or colors.

There is also a chance of rain, embers, thunder, and many other rare occurences.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move. You can also use spacebar or Z to jump.
R to instantly generate a new world.
